A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terribly disappointing.  There's just so much wrong with it.  They literally torched Jedi lore.  I honestly don't know where they go next with this weak storyline.  Leia should've perished\, Luke should've continued on...etc\, etc.  Arrrggghhh\, just plain sad that I'd rather watch a prequel.  JJ has an even bigger task ahead of him now than he did reviving the franchise with TFA.
